content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59) with burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (1, -60)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Stone furnace at (2, -56) with burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)

### Iron Smelting Array at (1, 1)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (1, 1) and (3, 1)
- Two wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5) and (3.5, 3.5)
- Three burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), and (5.5, 2.5)
- Additional wooden chest at (5.5, 3.5)

### Iron Smelting Array at (2, 7)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (2, 7) and (4, 7)
- Three wooden chests at (2.5, 9.5), (4.5, 9.5), and (8.5, 10.5)
- Three burner inserters at (3.5, 9.5), (2.5, 8.5), and (4.5, 8.5)

### Copper Cable Production Line
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5)
- Input chest at (14.5, 11.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 14.5)
- Burner inserters at (14.5, 12.5) and (12.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Input chest at (21.5, 12.5)
- Output chest at (24.5, 15.5)
- Burner inserters at (21.5, 13.5), (19.5, 15.5), and (23.5, 15.5)

### Power Generation Setup (Incomplete)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Additional offshore pumps at (2.5, 34.5) and (2.5, 36.5)
- Boiler at (18, 47.5)
- Steam engine at (29.5, 51.5)
- Multiple pipe groups attempting to connect these components

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production facilities, including:
- Belt network from smelting arrays to assembly machines
- Belt network for moving materials between different production areas

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors with fluid connections
- Ensure proper alignment and spacing when connecting fluid entities like boilers and pumps
- Check that connection points are not blocked by other entities
- Make sure pipes form continuous connections between fluid producers and consumers

### Power system issues
- Multiple entities showing "not receiving electricity" warnings
- Ensure power generation system (steam engine) is properly connected and receiving steam
- Check that electrical poles form a continuous network to all powered entities

### Production line stalling
- Multiple inserters showing "waiting for source items" warnings
- Ensure proper supply chain of materials to assembling machines
- Check that input chests are being supplied with required materials

### Fuel management
- Multiple "out of fuel" warnings on burner entities
- Keep burner entities supplied with appropriate fuel (coal)
- Consider setting up automated fuel delivery system
